üéØ Solve a Scramble

‚ÑπÔ∏è How it works

Enter a scramble below and click "Solve". The solver uses URF moves (U, U2, U', R, R2, R', F, F2, F') which form a complete system for 2x2x2. The first solve builds a pruning table (~3-4 seconds), subsequent solves are much faster (<1 second).

‚ö° Quick Test Suite

Run multiple scrambles to see the performance benefit of persistent tables.
